Html:
I have been battling with this for hours looks like a great tool but I just cant get it working.

I have tried installing 3 versions of the add-in and the MSI version.

I see it in the Add-in manager

I see the options in tools.

However I create a file called file.chirp.css and I get no code behind view.

What am I doing wrong have a missed something ?

Code behind don't work on projet type web project. work on project type web appplication and MVC.

In web project file is only  create on hd.

If not file is generate test with console version
Thanks for the response, crated a new MVC application and tried it again and still no joy.

Here at work our "My Documents" are stored on network storage, so its actually on \\someserver\somelocation\My Documents\

Some plugins that use java, or just plain ..some plugins. Don't like/trust paths like \\

The solution here was to create a folder like c:\vs-addins\ and dump all my custom addins in there instead, and then add that folder to the visual studio addin paths.

 

Download the vsix, open it as a zip, and take the files from inside and place the in for example your folder c:\vs-addins\chirpy
